article_title: Razer's Blade 15 packs an 8-core Intel CPU and RTX 2080 Super
article_description: Razer has unveiled the 2020 Blade 15 Advanced with more gaming and content creation power  along with one long overdue addition  To start with  the Advanced model is the first Razer Blade with an 8 core CPU  namely the 10th generation Intel Core i7 10875  Tha
article_content: The Blade 15 Advanced also comes with NVIDIA s latest  X 2070 2080 Super GPUs with Max Q design  The new chips are not only faster than NVIDIA s last  X flagships  the  X 2080 and 2070  but feature NVIDIA s latest efficiency boosting Max Q tweaks like Adva   1515 chars
